name: Frowing
description:
A game about a frog that needs to eat to grow and become stronger. Welcome to life little frog!

You have born in this forest where you can eat whatever you can* to grow and become stronger, or as i like to call it:  F R O W I N G!

*Just be careful, there are some dangerous meals that can hurt you if you try to eat them, avoid spikes at all cost!

Controls:
  • Move - Arrow Keys / AWSD
  • Jump - SpaceBar / W
  • Eat - C / Ctrl Left
  • Restart game- Hold R until the screen start to fade
Created by: 
  • Joel Reyes (Programming)
  • Slend32 (Music)

Sprites by Monster Logix Studio

Game made in two weeks for My First Game Jam: Winter 2023

The game is still in development, if you encounter any bugs please comment it to fix them in a future update c:
